accrueInterestToTreasury(address).details: This function can only be called by the treasury contract

params.stablecoin: Stablecoin from which profits should be sent

addStablecoinSupport(address).details: This function can only be called by the `CoreBorrow` contract

params._treasury: Treasury associated to the stablecoin to add support for

flashFee(address,uint256).details: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

params.data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters.
params.receiver: The receiver of the tokens in the loan, and the receiver of the callback.

maxFlashLoan(address).details: The amount of currency available to be lended.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

removeStablecoinSupport(address).details: This function can only be called by the `CoreBorrow` contract

params._treasury: Treasury associated to the stablecoin to remove support for

setCore(address).details: This function can only be called by the `CoreBorrow` contract

setFlashLoanParameters(address,uint64,ui.details: Setting a `maxBorrowable` parameter equal to 0 is a way to pause the functionalityParameters can only be modified for whitelisted stablecoins

params._flashLoanFee: New flash loan fee for this stablecoin
params._maxBorrowable: Maximum amount that can be borrowed in a single flash loan
params.stablecoin: Stablecoin to change the parameters for

CALLBACK_SUCCESS().notice: Success message received when calling a `FlashBorrower` contract

accrueInterestToTreasury(address).notice: Sends the fees taken from flash loans to the treasury contract associated to the stablecoin

core().notice: Reference to the `CoreBorrow` contract managing the FlashLoan module

setFlashLoanParameters(address,uint64,ui.notice: Sets the parameters for a given stablecoin

stablecoinMap(address).notice: Maps a stablecoin to the data and parameters for flash loans

userdoc.notice: Contract to take flash loans on top of several AgToken contracts
